name: First Person Tennis - The Real Tennis Simulator
description: First Person Tennis is the first tennis simulator developed for HTC Vive, Oculus Rift and WMR. Now, you can play on a real tennis court and face professional tennis players. You'll have to show all your technical and tactical skills. The game is designed for gamepad or keyboard too.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10/8/7/Vista/XP Processor: 2.66 GHz Intel Core 2 Quad Q8400, 3.0 GHz AMD Phenom II X4 940 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / RADEON RX 580 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10/8/7/Vista/XP Processor: 3.5 GHz Intel Core i7 3700, 4.0 GHz AMD FX-8350 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 / RADEON RX VEGA 64 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space
